definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: This rise has been paralleled by an increase in fluid milk intake.
sentences.chinese: 糖尿病發病率的上升是與液體奶攝入量的增加並行的。

sentences.english: The oxygen radicals theory should be the etiology of presbyacusis.
sentences.chinese: 氧自由基學說可能是老年性聾的發病機制。

sentences.english: The pathogenesis of this multicentric disorder may be associated with autoimmune disease.
sentences.chinese: 它的多器官受累可能與自身免疫疾病的發病機制相似。

sentences.english: Courses include molecular biology, pathobiology, viral pathogenesis, and related topics.
sentences.chinese: 分子生物，病理學，病毒發病機理和相關主題。

sentences.english: Objective To research on the possible mechanism of male macula retinae.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討男性黃褐斑發病的可能機理。

sentences.english: The significance of pathogenesis of Growth-hormone secreting pituitary adenomas.
sentences.chinese: 深入探討垂體生長激素腺瘤發病機制的重要性。

sentences.english: However, the HPA suggested flu rates in England were now coming down.
sentences.chinese: 不過，HPA表示，流感發病率在英國正在下降。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the role of plasmatic fibrinogen in the pathogenesis of coronary heart disease (CHD).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討血漿纖維蛋白原在冠心病發病中的作用。

sentences.english: The prevention and control of edema disease of swine were reviewed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文對豬水腫病的發病機制及防治措施進行了綜述。

sentences.english: Because of the complexity of its pathogenesis, the exact causes of GCA are still not clear.
sentences.chinese: GCA的發病機制錯綜複雜，目前尚未完全明確。

sentences.english: The main pathophysiological changes of patients with PCOS are insulin resistance, hyperinsulinemia and hyperandrogenism.
sentences.chinese: 胰島素抵抗是多囊卵巢綜合徵的主要發病機制之一。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the outbreak of the hospital infection of the sufferers in brain surgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結腦外科住院患者醫院感染的發病情況。

sentences.english: To explore the directive significance on the differentiated treatment of rapid-progressed nephritis (RPN) by toxic pathogen.
sentences.chinese: 探討毒邪對急進性腎炎發病及治療的指導意義。

sentences.english: The highest incidence of AD was observed from 2 to 4 parity.
sentences.chinese: 真胃變位的發生以2～4胎次的奶牛發病率最高。

sentences.english: There has been a threefold increase in ectopic pregnancies in the U.S. since abortion was legalized.
sentences.chinese: 在美國，墮胎合法化後異位妊娠的發病率升高了3倍。

sentences.english: Objective To study the correlation between cholelithiasis and the infection of HBV.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討乙肝病毒感染在膽石症發病中的作用。

definition: to see a doctor/to seek medical advice
to make a definite diagnosis/confirmed (case of a specific disease)
to recur (of a disease)/to reappear/to relapse (into a former bad state)
